actions.name: Tithing Blade + 1
actions.desc: Melee weapon, +9, reach 5ft. (1d8 + 5) Slashing plus (2d8) Lightning damage. A creature brought to 0HP by the Tithing Blade is exanguinated and killed instantly

actions.name: Shield Bash
actions.desc: Melee weapon, +8, reach 5ft. (1d8 + 4) Bludgeoning damage and pushed 10ft. away

actions.name: Firebolt
actions.desc: Ranged spell attack, +7, 120ft. range (2d10) Fire damage

bonus_actions.name: Fury of the Nine
bonus_actions.desc: The Inquisitor General chooses another creature that can see or hear it within 120 feet. That creature gains advantage on all attack rolls and saving throws for the next minute or until the cambion uses this ability again.

reactions.name: Aegis of the Onlooker (3/day)
reactions.desc: On being hit by a melee attack, attacker recieves 2d6 psychic damage.

bonus_actions.name: Blood Curse of Binding
bonus_actions.desc: You attempt to bind a Large or smaller creature you can see within 30 feet of you, which must make a Strength saving throw DC 13. On a failure, the cursed creatureâs speed is reduced to 0 and it canât use reactions until the end of your next turn.

actions.name: Firebolt

bonus_actions.name: Brand of Sacrifice
bonus_actions.desc: The Inquisitor General chooses another creature that it can see within 60ft. of it. That creature is branded as though by a brand of castigation. Until the beginning of the General's next turn that creature cannot regain hitpoints, and must make a DC 15 Wis save or have every strike the general deal to it deal an additional 1d6 damage.

spells.Elandra is a 17th level spellcaster (DC: 18, +10 to spell attacks, Wisdom, prepare 21 spells)

spells.3rd level (O O O): Dispel Magic, Sending, Speak w Dead, Spirit Guardians, Glyph of Warding

spells.1st level (O O O O): Inflict Wounds, Command, Detect Magic, Guiding Bolt

spells.cantrips: Toll the Dead (4d8), Spare the Dying, Thaumaturgy, Light, Guidance

traits.name: Channe Divinity Blood Domain (Crimson bond or Blood Puppet)
Shapechanger
traits.desc: See the vampire statblock

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: While > 1 hp, Elandra regains 20 hp at the start of her turn. This trait does not function if she is in sunlight, running water, or if she has taken radiant damage or damage from holy water until her next turn after.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: Can climb walls/ceilings without any ability check

traits.name: Vampire Weaknesses
traits.desc: Harmed by running water. Take 20 acid damage if ends turn in running water. Stake to the heart. See vampire statblock. Sunlight Hypersensitivity. 20 radiant damage if start turn in sunlight.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: yk

traits.name: Misty Escape
traits.desc: See vampire statblock

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Elandra makes two attacks, one of which can be a bite. Or she makes two claw attacks and uses Bloodthorn Chains

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee attack; +9 to hit, 1d6 + 4 slashing + 2d8 necrotic or can grapple (escape DC 17)

actions.name: Bloodthorn Chains
actions.desc: One target within 60ft. Thorns of blood burst from the bloodstream and try to entangle the target. Target must succeed on a DC 18 Con save or suffer 3d8 necrotic damage and be restrained until the end of their next turn.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: +9 to hit, 5ft against a willing or grappled/incapacitated/restrained creature. (1d6 + 4) piercing plus (3d6 + 2d8) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. A humanoid slain in this way and then buried in the ground rises the following night as a vampire spawn under the vampire's control.

actions.name: Charm
actions.desc: Elandra targets one humanoid she can see within 30 ft. of him. If the target can see the vampire, the target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or be charmed by the vampire. The charmed target regards the vampire as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although the target isn't under the vampire's control, it takes the vampire's requests or actions in the most favorable way it can, and it is a willing target for the vampire's bite attack. Each time the vampire or the vampire's companions do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours or until the vampire is destroyed, is on a different plane of existence than the target, or takes a bonus action to end the effect.

legendary_actions.name: Move
legendary_actions.desc: Move up to her speed without provoking attacks of opportunity

legendary_actions.name: Claws
legendary_actions.desc: Elandra makes an Claws attack or uses a summoned blood weapon

legendary_actions.name: Sanguine Rosaria (Costs 3 actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Elandra collects the blood on the ground into the shape of weapons, summoning three third-level spiritual weapons as blood weapons, which she can move and attack with this turn (2d8 + 4) force damage

bonus_actions.name: Spiritual Weapon
bonus_actions.desc: Spell of Weapons of the Spirit (DOES FORCE DAMAGE)

spells.3rd Level O O O: Armour of Agathys, Charm Person, Fear, Hold Person, Misty Step, Enemies Abound

traits.name: Brand of Castigation (1/rest)

actions.name: Dimension Door (Cape of the Mountebank)
actions.desc: Casts Dimension Door

bonus_actions.name: Blood curse of the Anxious
bonus_actions.desc: 30ft., (Amplified), the next Wisdom save the target makes is at disadvantage.

bonus_actions.name: Blood Curse of Binding
bonus_actions.desc: Range 30ft. Target = <=Large creature. Str Save. Fail = Speed reduced to 0, and canât use reactions until start of enforcerâs next turn. Amplified = Duration is 1 minute and target must repeat save at the end of turns + no size limit.

bonus_actions.name: Feinting Attack
bonus_actions.desc: One creature in 5 ft. Next attack roll has advantage, and deals an extra superiority die damage.

bonus_actions.name: Trip Attack
bonus_actions.desc: When you hit with an attack, add sup die to damage, and creature must make a str save or fall prone

reactions.name: Unbalancing Strike Riposte (1 superiority die)
reactions.desc: Against a creature that missed with a melee attack, +10 to hit, (1d4 + 1d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage and DC 18 Dex Save or be unable to make a melee weapon attack until the beginning of their next turn.

reactions.name: Blood Curse of the Eyeless (Hunter's Bane)
reactions.desc: Against a creature within 30ft. making an attack, subtract 1 hemocraft die on the attack roll. Amplified is for all attacks

reactions.name: Blood Curse of Exposure
reactions.desc: When creature in 30ft takes damage, remove resistance to triggering damage type. Amplified remove invulnerability, treating it like resistance (Until end of next turn)
